challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak të bëł jes słëszôł, to òni bë bëlë cëchi.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.answer: Jak të bëł jes słëszôł, to òni bë bëlë cëchi.
challenges.meaning: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: Jak të bëł jes słëszôł, to òni bë bëlë cëchi.
If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak të bëł jes nie béł głëpi, to bëł jes nie robił głëpòtów.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.answer: Jak të bëł jes nie béł głëpi, to bëł jes nie robił głëpòtów.
challenges.meaning: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formattedSolution: Jak të bëł jes nie béł głëpi, to bëł jes nie robił głëpòtów.
If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak òni bë bëlë nie bëlë leniwi, to më bë bëlë jesmë jim pòmôgalë.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.answer: Jak òni bë bëlë nie bëlë leniwi, to më bë bëlë jesmë jim pòmôgalë.
challenges.meaning: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.formattedSolution: Jak òni bë bëlë nie bëlë leniwi, to më bë bëlë jesmë jim pòmôgalë.
If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Dzëcë są mądri jak na swòj wiek.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.answer: Dzëcë są mądri jak na swòj wiek.
challenges.meaning: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.formattedSolution: Dzëcë są mądri jak na swòj wiek.
Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak wë bë bëlë jeste nie bëlë słabi, to wë bë bëlë jeste robòtalë.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.answer: Jak wë bë bëlë jeste nie bëlë słabi, to wë bë bëlë jeste robòtalë.
challenges.meaning: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.formattedSolution: Jak wë bë bëlë jeste nie bëlë słabi, to wë bë bëlë jeste robòtalë.
If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaning: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.formattedSolution: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaning: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.formattedSolution: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.meaning: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formattedSolution: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Jak ja bëł jem béł òdwôżni, to ja bëł jem sã nie bòjôł.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If I were brave, I would not be afraid.

challenges.answer: Jak ja bëł jem béł òdwôżni, to ja bëł jem sã nie bòjôł.
challenges.meaning: If I were brave, I would not be afraid.
